name: MKClusterAnnotation
desc: An annotation that groups two or more distinct annotations into a single entity.

items.name: init(memberAnnotations: [MKAnnotation])
items.desc: Initializes the cluster annotations with the specified individual annotations.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title string to display for the group of annotations.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The subtitle string to display for the group of annotations.

items.name: var memberAnnotations: [MKAnnotation]
items.desc: The annotations that are grouped together by the cluster.
